BLINDROLLSKILLS.SettingForceBlindRollsHi: Toggle this on to hide the results of skills selected below from non-GMs.
BLINDROLLSKILLS.SettingHideDeathSavesHin: This only hides the roll in the chat. Users will still see the number of successes and failures on the character sheet.
BLINDROLLSKILLS.SettingShowHelpCardsHint: Toggle this on to display chat messages when your rolls are made blindly because of this module.
BLINDROLLSKILLS.ChatCardHelpText: Your roll is hidden from you because your GM has chosen this type of roll to be made blind by default.
BLINDROLLSKILLS.ChatCardDisableText: Only you can see this message. If you no longer wish to recieve these notifications, you can disable them via Game Settings > Configure Settings > Module Settings.
